name: Tri Bogatyrya i Shamakhanskaya Tsaritsa
storyline: Famous epic heroes Alyosha Popovich, Dobrynya Nikitich and Ilya Muromets have come together to protect the Russian land! An unexpected disaster struck fabulous Russia — the treacherous Shamakhi tsarina seized the princely throne, once again proving that beauty is a terrible force. Oh, and it won't be easy for loyal friends to fight such a scourge! They will have to visit foreign countries and go through many trials: to get an audience with the Chinese emperor, find Robin Hood in medieval England and even escape from paradise. But strong friendship and mutual assistance will help you overcome any obstacles!
summary: How Not to Rescue a Princess is a quest and Point-and-click game based on the cartoon of the same name. Unlike previous games, this game has its own storyline that has nothing to do with the cartoon. In addition, this is the latest game in the franchise in the quest genre.
